name: multivitamin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pill or liquid containing a range of vitamins that your body needs, intended to be taken regularly: Taking a daily multivitamin is a good idea. Multivitamins rarely contain much calcium.
More examplesFewer examplesNow's a good time to choose a multivitamin and take it regularly. Should I put my kids on a multivitamin?There are a number of multivitamins and minerals on the market today that include lutein.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Vitamins & minerals
(of a pill or liquid) containing a range of vitamins that your body needs and intended to be taken regularly: a multivitamin supplement/tablet/pill
More examplesFewer examplesHer only non-prescription medication was a multivitamin tablet. Some parents give their children multivitamin supplements because they are the only liquid sources of vitamin D.Although a multivitamin preparation usually prevents folate or other B-complex deficiencies, it does not adequately prevent iron deficiency.
